name: The hungry duck
description:
You are a duck sitting in the top left field of a rectangular lake.
In every field of the lake is a different amount of food.
Your duck is only allowed to move to the right or down.
What is the maximum amount of food you can eat before reaching the bottom right field?

If you have the following lake
```
1 2
3 4
```

There are two paths to go
1 -> 2 -> 4, sum 7 or
1 -> 3 -> 4, sum 8

so 8 would be the maximum.

If you have the following lake
```
1 2 3
4 5 6
7 8 9
```

The best path would be 1->4->7->8->9, sum 29.

Task
----

Implement the max_food function which receives one argument:
  - grid: list(list(int))

This function should return one value:
  - the maximum food you can get from the lake
